history.heading: Parametric signal amplifiers having all of the following:
history.title: Parametric signal amplifiers having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: A. “End Items,” “Equipment,” “Accessories,” “Attachments,” “Parts,” “Components,” and “Systems”
3A901 Electronic items, not specified by ECCN 3A001, as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
history.text:
Parametric signal amplifiers having all of the following:
Designed for operation at an ambient temperature below 1 K (−272.15 °C);
b.1. Designed for operation at an ambient temperature below 1 K (−272.15 °C);
Designed for operation at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz; and
b.2. Designed for operation at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz; and
A noise figure less (better) than 0.015 dB at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz at 1 K (−272.15 °C).
b.3. A noise figure less (better) than 0.015 dB at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz at 1 K (−272.15 °C).
Note: For the purposes of 3A901.b, parametric signal amplifiers include Travelling Wave Parametric Amplifiers (TWPAs).
Technical Note: For the purposes of 3A901.b, parametric signal amplifiers may also be referred to as Quantum-limited amplifiers (QLAs).

content.html: b.3. A noise figure less (better) than 0.015 dB at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz at 1 K (−272.15 °C).

content.html:
Note:

For the purposes of 3A901.b, parametric signal amplifiers include Travelling Wave Parametric Amplifiers (TWPAs).

children.heading: Designed for operation at an ambient temperature below 1 K (−272.15 °C);
children.label: 3A901.b.1 – Designed for operation at an ambient temperature below 1 K (−272.15 °C);

content.html: b.1. Designed for operation at an ambient temperature below 1 K (−272.15 °C);
content.text: b.1. Designed for operation at an ambient temperature below 1 K (−272.15 °C);

children.heading: Designed for operation at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz; and
children.label: 3A901.b.2 – Designed for operation at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz; and

content.html: b.2. Designed for operation at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz; and
content.text: b.2. Designed for operation at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz; and

children.heading: A noise figure less (better) than 0.015 dB at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz at 1 K (−272.15 °C).
children.label: 3A901.b.3 – A noise figure less (better) than 0.015 dB at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz at 1 K (−272.15 °C).

content.html: b.3. A noise figure less (better) than 0.015 dB at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz at 1 K (−272.15 °C).
content.text: b.3. A noise figure less (better) than 0.015 dB at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz at 1 K (−272.15 °C).

content.html:
Note:

For the purposes of 3A901.b, parametric signal amplifiers include Travelling Wave Parametric Amplifiers (TWPAs).
content.text: Note: For the purposes of 3A901.b, parametric signal amplifiers include Travelling Wave Parametric Amplifiers (TWPAs).

content.html:
Technical Note:

For the purposes of 3A901.b, parametric signal amplifiers may also be referred to as Quantum-limited amplifiers (QLAs).
content.text: Technical Note: For the purposes of 3A901.b, parametric signal amplifiers may also be referred to as Quantum-limited amplifiers (QLAs).

history.heading: Parametric signal amplifiers having all of the following:
history.title: Parametric signal amplifiers having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: List of Items Controlled
3A901 Electronic items, not specified by ECCN 3A001, as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
history.text:
Parametric signal amplifiers having all of the following:
Designed for operation at an ambient temperature below 1 K (−272.15 °C);
b.1. Designed for operation at an ambient temperature below 1 K (−272.15 °C);
Designed for operation at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz; and
b.2. Designed for operation at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz; and
A noise figure less (better) than 0.015 dB at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz at 1 K (−272.15 °C).
b.3. A noise figure less (better) than 0.015 dB at any frequency from 2 GHz up to and including 15 GHz at 1 K (−272.15 °C).
Note: For the purposes of 3A901.b, parametric signal amplifiers include Travelling Wave Parametric Amplifiers (TWPAs).
Technical Note: For the purposes of 3A901.b, parametric signal amplifiers may also be referred to as Quantum-limited amplifiers (QLAs).
